content.query:
--Check Existing Data
SELECT * FROM DimCustomer_1

--Check Existing Data
SELECT * FROM DimCustomer_1 WHERE CustomerID = 4   --Last Name = Gates

--Update CustomerSource table - Update LastName to Validate SCD - Type 1 flow
UPDATE CustomerSource
SET LastName = 'PATEL'
    WHERE CustomerID = 4 ;

SELECT * FROM CustomerSource WHERE CustomerID = 4;

--Last Name should be updated to PATEL for CustomerID = 4
SELECT * FROM DimCustomer_1 WHERE CustomerID = 4
